name: py-jsonargparse

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
An extension to python's argparse which simplifies parsing of
configuration options from command line arguments, json configuration
files (yaml or jsonnet supersets), environment variables and hard-coded
defaults.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-docstring-parser
dependencies.description: Parse Python docstrings in reST, Google and Numpydoc format.

dependencies.name: py-typeshed-client
dependencies.description: A library for accessing stubs in typeshed.

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description:
Use Lightning Apps to build everything from production-ready, multi-
cloud ML systems to simple research demos.
